price: ពួកគេបាននិយាយគ្នាថាៈ ចូរពួកអ្នកសង់សំណង់មួយ សម្រាប់គេ ហើយបោះគេចូលទៅក្នុងភ្លើងដ៏ក្ដៅនោះចុះ។
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū ib'nū lahu bun'yānan fa-alqūhu fī al-jaḥīmi
